dc_description_s: Summary This dataset contains hospital locations in the State of Minnesota. Geocoded locations updated with information from the Health Care Facility and Provider Database of hospitals for September 2018. Additional information was collected from Homeland Infrastructure Foundation-Level Data (HIFLD) hospital data set. Please note licensing and status of hospitals can change. Please refer to the web page for current status. Locations based on geocoding with additional corrections using the HIFLD data sets. Description Hospitals: shows all hospitals in the state of Minnesota, arranged by county. These locations were created from the Health Care Facility and Provider Database downloaded September 2018. Please note licensing and status of hospitals can change. Please refer to the web page for current status. Locations based on geocoding with additional corrections using the HIFLD data sets. See this link for more information. Addresses cleaned and geocoded by the Hennepin County Human Services and Public Health Dept (HSPHD) the Hennepin County GIS Office.. Where possible road centerline geocoded locations were improved to parcel centroid or building footprint. Additional modifications were performed by the GIS Office including the following: 1. Retention of the VA Hospital from previous geocoded versions. 2. Break out of the U of M East Bank, West Bank, and Masonic Childrens Hospitals. 3. Break out of the Rochester Mayo campuses. 4. Addition of Health System information supplied by HCMC staff. 5. Addition of website, trauma, and helipad information from HC GIS staff and Homeland Infrastructure Foundation GIS data. See the following sites for more information: https://hifld-dhs-gii.opendata.arcgis.com/ Additional trauma level information from: http://www.health.state.mn.us/traumasystem/designatedhospitals.html Additional helipad information from: http://www.airnav.com/airports/us/mn type=Huse=R Homeland Infrastructure Foundation-Level Data (HIFLD) - Hospitals https://hifld-geoplatform.opendata.arcgis.com/datasets/hospitals Map Service https://services1.arcgis.com/Hp6G80Pky0om7QvQ/arcgis/rest/services/Hospitals/FeatureServer/0 Link to Attribute Table Information: http://gis.hennepin.us/OpenData/Metadata/Minnesota%20Hospitals.pdf Use Limitations: This data (i) is furnished AS IS with no representation as to completeness or accuracy; (ii) is furnished with no warranty of any kind; and (iii) is not suitable for legal, engineering or surveying purposes. Hennepin County shall not be liable for any damage, injury or loss resulting from this data. Credits Created by the Hennepin County GIS Office.
